name: Chinese Chess Pro
description:
BEST CHINESE CHESS ON APPSTORE

  Chinese Chess Pro is the ultimate iPhone and iPod touch Chinese Chess board game. 

Chinese Chess Pro uses pieces similar to those of International Chess. However, the variations in the pieces, their movements, and the board layout make Xiangqi an exciting and challenging alternative to its cousin.  

Chinese Chess Pro is flexible for players at any level. From the avid Chinese Chess enthusiast to the humble beginner to the game, Chinese Chess Pro will definitely bring hours of enjoyment for you on your iPhone!   

Features include:
• 5 play modes : Computer-Human, Human-Human, Human-Human via Wifi, Bluetooth and Human-Human online via Game Center. 
  • The strongest Chinese Chess engine on the market at the moment 
• 7 levels of difficulty 
• Hundreds problem to solve
• Hundreds well-known game to review
• Support Save/Load game
 • Posture and quick deal
 • Support chess timer 
• Full undo-redo function with unlimited moves. 
• Option to show legal moves 
• Option to show last move 
• Support Hint moves
